page.title: 11INTERVIEW WITH Mr.STEEL
page.content:
{1)}How long have you been head-teacher? {2)}Were you a head teacher previously? {3)}Do you think the chance to share is a good thing? {4)}How does it help the school? {5)}Over the years do you think that the children have changed if so in what way? {6)}Are the children better clothed/fed than they were when you started teaching?
{ Mr.STEEL HEAD-MASTER ======================== {1)}7\ years, {2)}yes for 10 years, {3)}excellent, {4)}it adds to our facillities, {5)}children haven't changed but circumstances have, {6)}yes,
